title: Salon Product Logos
content:
Looking for typefaces on any of these logos:  
 [Alterna](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234446/http:/images.teamsugar.com/files/users/9/93124/44_2007/alterna.jpg)  
 [Redken](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234446/http:/www.mitchellshair.com/Portals/34/Logos/Redken%20logo.jpg)  
 [Paul Mitchell](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234446/http:/www.folica.com/images/uploads/large/217-Paul_Mitchell_Logo.gif)  
 [Matrix](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234446/http:/rupunzelshairstudio.liveonatt.com/custom_images/MATRIX_logo.jpg)
author: casinnola

comments.content:
Here are a couple more that I really need:  
 [Astara](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234446/http:/www.skinstore.com/resources/dynamic/store/categories/AstaraLogo.jpg)  
 [SkinCeuticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234446/http:/www.beauty-holic.com/catalog/images/skin%20ceuticals%20Logo.jpg)  
 [Peter Thomas Roth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234446/http:/images.dermstore.com/catalog/100157/logo_small.jpg)
MATRIX = [Stainless Ext Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234446/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/stainless/ext-regular/)? If you do a little work to the R, it looks real close.
